This is the hardest game to get into first starting, hands down.
If you don't know a lot of the mechanics people will abuse them to get an advantage above you 100% of the time. bullet spread is the worst and is extremely hard to learn. and the casual experience is one to one with the competitive experience so you won't be able to relax in the slightest playing this game.
It's such a shame that this game has so many flaws as the guns are extremely satisfying to shoot and the gamemodes would be very fun.

I really hate that csgo is getting more attention and craze then any of valve's other titles as it is in my opinion one of the worst games in their library.

Garbage as usual. I got disconnected after updating the game. Just tried to start a wingman and got dc'ed because of some files that didn't update. And on top of that, this shitty game doesn't even tell me how long I am banned from playing... They charge money for displaying stats, and ban as they choose. What a garbage, and absolutely puke-worthy mindset from devs. Jesus fucking christ, I only wish everyone would ban this game from their inventory.
